content.title: My Progress
text: This is where you get an overview of your progress. You select a step to get started.
Once a step is completed, you click on a star to turn it gold.

content.title: Steps
text: The app takes you through 5 steps to kickstart your blog. Each step contains instructions on how to create a post.
How you move through the steps and how long it takes is up to you – timings given are only a guide.
Work on paper or computer – it doesn't matter.

content.title: Collecting Stars
text: You complete each step by clicking on a star to collect it. By the end you will have all 5 stars.
You can't move onto the next step until you've completed the one before.

content.title: Continue Posting
text: Once you've kickstarted your blog you can access:
Bonus advice to give future blog posts more variety.
A super quick refresher course so you don't need to go through the long steps.
A 'post now' button so you can log your progress and build your blogging habit.
A calendar so you can view your progress.

content.title: More
text: On every page you can select 'more' so you can:
